name: Hanoi HomeVisit Tour
description:
Tourists can discover the beauty of Vietnam in an extraordinary way that is nowhere to be found.

At the end of each city tour, tourists are always taken to a restaurant to have dinner. With HANOI HOMEVISIT TOUR, instead, tourists will be invited to visit an ordinary Hanoi Family not only to have dinner with Hanoi people but also to observe the typical life of Vietnamese people, the true traditions and habits such as tea drinking, dinner preparation, family history,etc or even experience the bustle feeling of some festivals. 

Most importantly,throughout the conversation, there are tons of interesting stories to be told. In the end, the cozy atmosphere bringing foreigners and local people is the thing that leaps into everybody's heart.
